alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jasper; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 5:14PM CDT until May 11 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jasper County in east central Mississippi... Clarke County in east central Mississippi... Jones County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 514 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Crandall to near Sandersville to near Ellisville, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Laurel, Ellisville, Quitman, Stonewall, Sandersville, Heidelberg, Shubuta, Soso, De Soto, Pachuta, Crandall, Moss, Goodwater, Orange, Vernon, Snell, Stafford Springs, Barnett, Mill Creek and Tuckers Crossing. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central, southeastern and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
